t: Amazon Product Finder - AMZScout PRO Extension - Chrome Web Store
s: How to check sales data for any product: 1. Install the AMZScout PRO Chrome Extension. Begin your FREE trial by entering your details with a quick sign-up. 2. Access Amazon and search for any items you want to analyze. 3. Open the extension. 4. Review the product and niche information.
